name: Roosters and Robbers
description:
Roosters and Robbers is a cute platformer centered around Steve the Fox. The aim of the game is to pick up all the chickens without being taken by the big roosters! This project was created in a school environment and is the final product of several weeks of work.

Game Project 2022-2023, Högskolan i Skövde.

Developers: Andreas van Bussel, Anny Danneby, Elias Drake af Hagelsrum, Felix Dyrhede & Holley Fogell
